鋘鋘鋘

鋘字的基本解释

鋘
huá
古同“铧”。

鋘
wú
刀名：“两鋘植吾宫墙”。

鋘
wū
古同“圬”或“杇”，泥镘，泥工涂墙壁的工具。

鋘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huá］
［《廣韻》户花切，平麻，匣。］
同“鏵1”。
[②]［wú］
［《廣韻》五乎切，平模，疑。］
刀名。

鋘字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鋘； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1307第20
【廣韻】戸花切【韻會】【正韻】胡瓜切，?音華。【說文】本作㭉。兩刃臿也。【廣韻】鋘鍫。【後漢·獨行傳】戴就被考掠，燒鋘斧，使就挾于肘腋。【註】鋘，斧臿也。【集韻】或作鏵。　又【集韻】洪孤切，音胡。泥鏝也。塗工之具。或作釫。　又【廣韻】五乎切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】訛胡切，?音吾。錕鋘，山名。出金，可作刀以切玉。【列子·湯問篇】作錕鋙。【司馬相如·子虛賦】作昆吾。

考證：〔錕鋘，山名。出金，可作刀以切玉。【列子·殷湯篇】作錕鋙。〕　謹照原書改湯問篇。
鋘字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鋘字的起名意思

刀名。

Basic explanation of words
Stubborn
huá
Gu Tong "Hua".
Stubborn
wú
The name of the sword: "The Wall of the Two Yuans Planting My Palace".
Stubborn
wū
In ancient times, "圬" or "杇", mud trowel, mason's tool for painting walls.
Stubborn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huá]
["Guangyun" household flower cut, flat hemp, box. ]
Same as "Hua 1".
[②]［wú］
["Guangyun" five almost cut, flat model, suspicious. ]
The name of the knife.
Stubborn
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Su Ji 1】【Golden Word Department】　鋘; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1307 No. 20
[Guang Yun] 戸花切 [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] Courgette cut,? Yinhua. 【Said the text】This work is 㭉. Two-edged sword also. 【Guangyun】Fengyun. [Later Han·Lone Travel Biography] Dai was plundered, burned axe, and pinched him in his elbows. [Note] Cheng, axe also. [Ji Yun] Or make Hua.　[Jiyun] Hong Guqie, Yinhu. The mud trowel also. Paint tools. Or make 釫.　[Guangyun] Wuhuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Huqie,? Yinwu. Kun, the name of the mountain. Withdrawal of gold can be used as a knife to cut jade. [Liezi·Tangwen Chapter] Created by Kun Jing. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】As Kunwu. Textual research: 〔锟鋘, name of the mountain. Withdrawal of gold can be used as a knife to cut jade. 【Liezi·Yintang Article】made by Kun Zheng. 〕　I would like to change the Tang Wen chapter according to the original book.
